title: ADC main looking for team.
body: I am and adc main on oce and i play mainly vayne/twitch/lucian and sometimes sivir or other ad carries. I am currently only ranked at b3 after a big loss streak, but i am climbing back up. Though i am very low in rank, i have good farming skills and mechanics and just need a team that consists of a shotcaller that I can listen to as i tend to focus on farming or turrets. Add me in game if you are interested, even if only for one game to see how I do, my ign is TEMASTER,  and heres a link to my stats: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=TEMASTER
